  • Hi, I'm Ross

    A self-taught web designer / developer based in Cambridgeshire, UK. I've been studying online for the past few years using resources such as Treehouse, FreeCodeCamp, Codecademy, CodeSchool, Udemy, and many more. I have experience building custom responsive websites with HTML5, CSS3, and JS/jQuery, as well as experience with front end frameworks, CLI and Git. Currently I'm focusing my studies on understanding the more advanced side of JavaScript, as well as ES6, Sass, PHP, and MySQL. My aim is to eventually become a full stack JavaScript developer as I move on to studying MongoDB, Express, ReactJS, Node.JS, and Webpack.

I'm currently available for freelance work.

If you have a project, or need help with a website, please get in touch.
